title: Developing applications with IntelliJ Idea and WildFly
content: IntelliJ IDEA is a popular choice for developing Enterprise applications featuring automatic Maven and Maven integration. In this tutorial we will learn how to integrate IntelliJ with WildFly or JBoss EAP. IntelliJ IDEA assumes that all development, debugging, and testing is done on your computer and then the code is deployed to a production environment. Let’s see ...  The post appeared first on .
